1: <pb/>Ri e u c'ojol ri Israel e are ri Ruben, Simion, Levi, Juda, Isacar, Zabulon,
2: <pb/>Dan, Jose, Benjamin, Neptali, Gad xukuje' ri Aser.
3: <pb/>Ri e u c'ojol tak ri Juda: Er, Onan xukuje' ri Sel. Ri qui nan we oxib ri' are' ri u mia'l Sua, aj cananey. Are' c'u ri Er, u nabeal ri Juda, sibalaj itzel winak rumal ri' xesax ri u c'aslemal rumal ri Ajawaxel.
4: <pb/>Ri Tamar ralib ri Juda, xeralaj quieb ral che wa', ri Pares xukuje' ri Zera. E job c'ut ri e u c'ojol ri Juda chi conojel.
5: <pb/>Ri e u c'ojol ri Pares e are' wa' Hezron xukuje' ri Hamul.
6: <pb/>Ri e u c'ojol ri Zera e are' wa' Zimri, Etan, Heman, Calcol xukuje' ri Dard, e job chi conojel.
7: <pb/>Ri u c'ojol ri Carmi are' ri Acar, ri xuc'am ulok quiäksakil puwi' ri Israel aretak xumajij ri takaninak wi ri Dios chi kas cäsachisax u wäch.
8: <pb/>Ri u c'ojol ri Etan are' ri Azariy.
9: <pb/>Ri e u c'ojol ri Hezron e are' wa' Jerameel, Ram xukuje' ri Quelubay.
10: <pb/>Ri Ram are' u tat ri Aminadab, ri Aminadab are' u tat ri Naason, c'amal qui be ri e rija'lil ri Juda.
11: <pb/>Ri Naason are' u tat ri Salm, ri Salm are' u tat ri Booz,
12: <pb/>ri Booz are' u tat ri Obed, ri Obed are' u tat ri Isayi,
13: <pb/>ri Isayi are' u tat ri Eliab, ri nabe u c'ojol; ri Abinadab, ri ucab; ri Simey, ri urox;
14: <pb/>ri Natanael, ri ucaj; ri Raday, ri uro';
15: <pb/>ri Ozem, ri uwak; are' c'u ri David, ri uwuk.
16: <pb/>Ri e canab tak we achijab ri' e are' wa' ri Sarb xukuje' ri Abigail. Ri e ral ri Sarb e oxib: Abisay, Joab xukuje' ri Asael.
17: <pb/>Ri Abigail xc'oji' jun ral ala, Amas, u bi', u c'ojol ri Jeter aj ismael.
18: <pb/>Ri Caleb, ri u c'ojol ri Hezron, xc'oji' jun u c'ojol ruc' ri Azub, ri rixokil: Jeriot u bi'. Ri niq'uiaj u c'ojol chic e are' wa' Jezer, Sobab xukuje' ri Ardon.
19: <pb/>Aretak xcäm ri Azub, ri Caleb xc'uli' ruc' ri Eprat, xc'oji' c'ut jun u c'ojol ruc': Hur u bi'.
20: <pb/>Ri Hur are' u tat ri Uri, ri Uri are' u tat ri Bezaleel.
21: <pb/>Aretak c'o chic oxc'al (60) u junab ri Hezron, xc'uli' ruc' ri u mia'l ri Maquir, ri u tat ri Galaad, xc'oji' c'ut jun u c'ojol ruc': Segub u bi'.
22: <pb/>Ri Segub are' u tat ri Jair, ri xeboc juwinak oxib (23) tinimit aj Galaad pa u k'ab.
23: <pb/>Are' c'u ri Jesur xukuje' ri Aram xequitokij tak ri ulew ri e c'o pa u k'ab ri Jair, xukuje' ri e rech ri Kenat e rachil ri alaj tak u tinimit, e oxc'al (60) tinimit chi conojel. Conojel tak wa' e are' ri e rija'lil ri Maquir, ri u tat ri Galaad.
24: <pb/>Cäminak chic Hezron ri Caleb xc'uli' ruc' ri Eprat, ri rixokil ri Hezron, ri u tat, xc'oji' c'ut jun u c'ojol ruc' ri Asur ri are' u tat ri Teco.
25: <pb/>Ri e u c'ojol ri Jerameel, nabeal u c'ojol ri Hezron, e are' ri Ram, ri nabeal, Bun, Oren, Ozem xukuje' ri Ahiy.
26: <pb/>Ri Jerameel xc'oji' chic jun rixokil, Atar, u bi', are' c'ut u nan ri Onam.
27: <pb/>Ri nabeal u c'ojol ri Jerameel are' ri Ram. Ri e u c'ojol ri Ram e are' ri Maaz, ri Jamin xukuje' ri Equer.
28: <pb/>Ri e u c'ojol ri Onam e are' wa' ri Samay xukuje' ri Jad. <pb/>Ri e u c'ojol ri Samay e are' ri Nadab xukuje' ri Abisur.
29: <pb/>Ri rixokil ri Abisur Abihail u bi' are' c'ut u nan ri Ahban xukuje' ri Molid.
30: <pb/>Ri e u c'ojol ri Nadab e are' ri Seled xukuje' ri Apaim. Ri Seled xcämic man xebalax ta u c'ojol.
31: <pb/>Ri Apaim are' u tat ri Isi. Ri Isi are' u tat ri Sesan. Ri Sesan are' u tat ri Alay.
32: <pb/>Ri e u c'ojol ri Jad, rachalal ri Samay, e are' ri Jeter xukuje' ri Jonatan. Ri Jeter xcämic man xebalax ta u c'ojol.
33: <pb/>Ri e u c'ojol ri Jonatan e are' ri Pelet xukuje' ri Zas. <pb/>E are' tak wa' ri rija'lil ri Jerameel.
34: <pb/>Ri Sesan man xebalax ta u c'ojol: xuwi tak u mia'l. C'o c'u jun lok'om u pataninel rech aj Ejipt Jarha u bi'
35: <pb/>che wa' xuya' wi jun chque ri u mia'l che rixokil, ri xc'oji' jun ral ala: Atay u bi'.
36: <pb/>Ri Atay are' u tat ri Natan, ri Natan are' u tat ri Zabad,
37: <pb/>ri Zabad are' u tat ri Eplal, ri Eplal are' u tat ri Obed,
38: <pb/>ri Obed are' u tat ri Jehu, ri Jehu are' u tat ri Azariy,
39: <pb/>ri Azariy are' u tat ri Heles, ri Heles are' u tat ri Elas,
40: <pb/>ri Elas are' u tat ri Sismay, ri Sismay are' u tat ri Salum,
41: <pb/>ri Salum are' u tat ri Jecamiy, ri Jecamiy are' u tat ri Elisam.
42: <pb/>Ri e u c'ojol ri Caleb, rachalal ri Jerameel, e are' ri Mesa, ri nabeal, ri are' u tat ri Zip, xukuje' ri Mares, ri ucab, are' c'u u tat ri Hebron.
43: <pb/>Ri e u c'ojol ri Hebron e are' ri Core, Tapu, Requem xukuje' ri Sema.
44: <pb/>Ri u c'ojol ri Sema are' ri Raham, ri u c'ojol ri Raham are' Jorcoam; ri u c'ojol ri Requem are' ri Samay.
45: <pb/>Ri u c'ojol ri Samay are' ri Maon, ri u c'ojol ri Maon are' ri Bet-sur.
46: <pb/>Ri Epa, ri man kas ta rixokil ri Caleb, are' u nan ri Haran, Mos xukuje' ri Gazez. Ri u c'ojol ri Haran are' ri Gazez.
47: <pb/>Ri e u c'ojol ri Jaday e are' ri Rejem, Jotam, Jesan, Pelet, Epa xukuje' ri Saap.
48: <pb/>Ri Maac, u man kas ta rixokil ri Caleb, are' qui nan ri Seber xukuje' ri Tirhan.
49: <pb/>Xukuje' are' u nan ri Saap, u tat ri Madman, xukuje' re ri Seb, u tat ri Macben xukuje' re ri Jibey. Ri Caleb xukuje' xc'oji' jun u mia'l Acsa u bi'.
50: <pb/>E are' tak wa' ri e rija'lil ri Caleb. <pb/>Ri e u c'ojol ri Hur (u nabeal ri Eprat): e are' ri Sobal (ri u c'ojol ri Sobal are' ri Quiriat-jearim);
51: <pb/>ri Salm (ri u c'ojol ri Salm are' ri Belen); xukuje' Harep (ri u c'ojol ri Harep are' ri Bet-gader).
52: <pb/>Ri e u c'ojol ri Sobal (u tat ri Quiriat-jearim) e are' ri Reaiy, pa niq'uiaj chque ri manahetitab,
53: <pb/>xukuje' ri u k'ab cachalaxic ri Quiriat-jearim: ri e aj itritab, ri aj potitab, ri aj sumatitab xukuje' ri aj misraitab, ri xepe wi ri aj zoratitab xukuje' ri e aj estaolitab.
54: <pb/>Ri e u c'ojol ri Salm e are' ri Belen, ri e aj netopatitab, ri Atrot-bet-joab, ri jun pa niq'uiaj chic chque ri aj manahetitab, ri e aj zoratib
55: <pb/>xukuje' ri u k'ab cachalaxic ri aj soperitab ri xejeki' can pa Jabes, che u bixic, ri e aj tirateyab, ri e aj simeatab xukuje' ri aj sucateyib. E are' tak wa' ri aj quenitab ri e petinak che ri Hamat, u tat ri Bet-recab.
